item.description:
Hi, John.
Yes, USBeep is background application. Using OS X Speech Synthesis framework.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, John.

Yes, USBeep is background application.
Using OS X Speech Synthesis framework.

item.title: John より

item.description:
hello, is it just a software application? When the alarm rings does it come from the cumputer itself?
Grtz
